question: What is the format of Dancing with the Stars: Juniors?
phrase: Contestants are scored by a panel of judges and the viewers vote for their favorite couples
predAns: The format is similar to the original Dancing with the Stars, but featuring celebrity children and professional junior ballroom dancers as partners. Each couple is composed of one celebrity and one junior dancer. They perform various styles of dance. The pairs are judged by a panel of experts. The public also has a say in the elimination process. The celebrities perform to live music with the band in the ballroom. The show airs on Sunday nights. The show features young celebrities and professional junior ballroom dancers performing choreographed routines. The couples set off the show's very first season with the enthusiasm and spirit that embodies DWTS Junior. Each couple will perform a dance with routines ranging in style from samba to foxtrot. The judges will make their final decisions based on the performances. The junior pros will come to impress, as well as the adorable junior celebrities. [1, 3]
